author: Charlotte O'Leary
method: Pre-heat the oven to 180C/350F/Gas 4. Grease and flour a 20cm/8in square cake tin with some of the sunflower oil. In a bowl sift together the flour, salt, cocoa powder and sugar.  Add the oil, soya milk and vanilla extract, and mix carefully together until completely mixed. Pour into the tin, and bake for about 25 minutes, until the brownies spring back when gently pressed. Leave to cool for five minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack.
ingredients: 170g/6oz self-raising flour,  salt,  2 tbsp cocoa powder,  170g/6oz caster sugar,  5 tbsp sunflower oil, plus extra for greasing,  230ml/8fl oz sweetened soya milk,  1 tsp vanilla extract
